query:
SELECT 
  p.id,
  p.apiId,
  c.active as countryActive,
  s.active as serviceActive,
  a.active as apiActive
FROM prices p
LEFT JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id
WHERE s.smshubCode = 'wa'
ORDER BY p.apiId;

  a.active as apiActive

LEFT JOIN countries c ON p.countryId = c.id
LEFT JOIN services s ON p.serviceId = s.id
LEFT JOIN sms_apis a ON p.apiId = a.id

ORDER BY p.apiId;
